subject: John Deere Classic (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Chez Reavie, with a hot putter, shot a 62 to take a two-stroke lead in the second round of the John Deere Classic in Silvis, Ill.
snippet: Chez Reavie, with a hot putter, shot a 62 to take a two-stroke lead in the second round of the John Deere Classic in Silvis, Ill.
